description: A lightweight, native macOS focus companion that helps users start deep work quickly and sustain attention through simple timed sessions and ambient reinforcement.

userStories.title: Start a focus session from the notch companion
userStories.description: As a deep-work user, I want to start a session from the notch UI so that I can begin focusing without opening a full app window.
acceptanceCriteria: Create macOS app project with Swift and SwiftUI
Implement notch companion UI that is visible when app is running
Add primary action button to start a 25-minute focus session
Session state changes to running within 500ms of user click
Typecheck/lint passes

userStories.title: Run fixed Pomodoro presets
userStories.description: As a user, I want fixed presets so that I can follow a simple, repeatable routine without configuration overhead.
acceptanceCriteria: Implement timer engine with work/break state management
Support 25/5 preset (25 min work, 5 min break)
Support 50/10 preset (50 min work, 10 min break)
Allow preset selection before session start
Work and break durations follow selected preset exactly
Typecheck/lint passes

userStories.title: Pause and resume active sessions
userStories.description: As a user, I want pause/resume controls so that I can handle unavoidable interruptions without losing progress.
acceptanceCriteria: Add pause button to active session UI in notch companion
Add resume button when session is paused
Remaining time is preserved exactly across pause/resume
UI clearly indicates paused vs running state with visual distinction
Typecheck/lint passes

userStories.title: Play ambient sound during sessions
userStories.description: As a user, I want ambient sound while focusing so that I can reduce distraction and maintain flow.
acceptanceCriteria: Create audio engine using AVFoundation
Include 5 built-in ambient tracks: rain, forest, cafe, brown noise, lo-fi
Add audio track selector UI
Implement volume control slider
Audio stops automatically when session ends
Typecheck/lint passes

userStories.title: Receive lightweight session-complete feedback
userStories.description: As a user, I want subtle completion feedback so that finishing a session feels rewarding without being disruptive.
acceptanceCriteria: Implement session completion animation in notch UI
Animation triggers when work or break session completes
Completion feedback does not steal keyboard focus
Next state (break or idle) is clearly shown after animation
Typecheck/lint passes

userStories.title: View minimal personal progress
userStories.description: As a user, I want minimal tracking so that I can stay motivated without being overwhelmed by analytics.
acceptanceCriteria: Implement local persistence using Core Data or equivalent
Track daily focus minutes total
Track daily completed work session count
Calculate and display current 7-day streak
Data persists across app relaunch
Add minimal progress view to notch companion
Typecheck/lint passes
